select a.act_no, a.mem_id, a.act_title, a.act_price, a.act_rating, a.act_review_cnt, m.mem_no, m.mem_nickname, i.img_no, i.img_name, i.img_level, i.img_status, i.img_refcode, i.img_refno from activity a inner join image i on i.img_refno = a.act_no inner join member m on a.mem_id = m.mem_id where

select orderedlist.* from (select a.act_no, a.mem_id, a.act_title, a.act_price, a.act_category, a.act_rating, a.act_review_cnt, m.mem_no, m.mem_nickname, i.img_no, i.img_name, i.img_level, i.img_status, i.img_refcode, i.img_refno from activity a inner join image i on i.img_refno = a.act_no inner join member m on a.mem_id = m.mem_id where act_status = 'Y' and a.act_endday > sysdate and i.img_refcode = 1 and i.img_level = 0 order by a.act_rating desc, a.act_review_cnt desc, act_date asc) orderedlist where rownum <= 50

select orderedlist.* from (select a.act_no, a.mem_id, a.act_title, a.act_price, a.act_category, a.act_rating, a.act_review_cnt, m.mem_no, m.mem_nickname, i.img_no, i.img_name, i.img_level, i.img_status, i.img_refcode, i.img_refno from activity a inner join image i on i.img_refno = a.act_no inner join member m on a.mem_id = m.mem_id where act_status = 'Y' and a.act_endday > sysdate and i.img_refcode = 1 and i.img_level = 0 order by a.act_endday asc) orderedlist where rownum < = 5
